valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Wed 1 Oct 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Thu 2 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: Low 300 miles southwest of Iceland 982 expected 200 miles north of Iceland 980 by midnight tonight. New high expected just west of Trafalgar 1025 by same time

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, southeasterly 6 to gale 8, veering southerly 5 or 6. In east, southeasterly 6 to gale 8.
Sea state
In west, rough, occasionally moderate at first in south. in east, moderate or rough, occasionally very rough.
Weather
In west, fair then occasional rain. In east, showers then rain.
Visibility
In west, good, becoming moderate or poor. In east, good, becoming moderate or poor.
Viking.gale_warning:
Gale warning
Issued:
15:52 (UTC) on Tue 30 Sep 2025
Southerly gale force 8 expected later
